code: import React from'react';import emailjs from'emailjs-com';import'hover.css';import emailSent from"../../assets/icons/lets-talk/mail-sent.svg";import'./LetsTalk.css';function LetsTalk(){function sendEmail(e){e.preventDefault();emailjs.sendForm('mail_service','contact_form',e.target,'user_hjPQvThNWiLpxLwBavpB7');var msgSentCont=document.getElementsByClassName('msg-sent-container')[0];msgSentCont.classList.add('visible');msgSentCont.addEventListener('click',function(){msgSentCont.classList.remove('visible');});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{className:"lets-talk-figure",src:"https://api-lunacy.icons8.com/api/assets/91b4843a-cc93-4808-9362-f81643218840/OrnamentDottedwhite.png",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{className:"contact-form",onSubmit:sendEmail},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",{className:"form-title"},"Feel free to contact me and say hello!"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"hidden",name:"contact_number"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",placeholder:"Your name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("input",{type:"email",name:"user_email",placeholder:"E-mail address",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("textarea",{name:"message",placeholder:"Your message here...",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-form-btn"},"Send message"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"msg-sent-container hidden hvr-ripple-out"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:emailSent,className:"mail-icon",alt:"mail"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",{className:"msg-sent-text"},"Message successfully sent!"))));};export default LetsTalk;
